    RightClickRunPython â€“ Run Python Scripts with a Right-Click

    Tired of opening the terminal and navigating to the script location every time you want to run a Python script? RightClickRunPython makes it easyâ€”just right-click on a .py file and run it instantly!

    ðŸš€ Features

    • Right-Click & Run â€“ Adds a Windows context menu entry to execute Python scripts.
    • Customizable â€“ Choose which Python version to use.
    • Easy Installation â€“ Just run the script to set it up.
    • Supports Arguments â€“ Run scripts with command-line arguments.

    ðŸ›  Installation

    1. Clone the repository: 
      git clone https://github.com/mattchoo2/rightclickrunpython.git
    2. Run the setup script: 
      python install.py
    3. Right-click any .py file and select Run with Python!
